response.overview: Sooreedu Film is a Biopic of Telangana Writer Bhootham Muthyalu, During his college education in Hyderabad, he took up rickshaw pulling jobs and working in hotels in the evenings to support his own expenses. He got a job as a secondary grade teacher in 1996 and is currently working in a primary school., He continues to write in the field of literature. He used to write poems and works from childhood. Kaloji Narayana Rao's writings influenced him.
response.title: Sooreedu
